description: To erect two floor rooftop extension and carry out external alterations, including new/reinstated entrances, external spiral slide to Whitechapel elevation and projecting sixth floor rooftop hot tub to Victoria Street elevation, in connection with the use of the building as: a hotel (Use Class C1) comprising 125 no. suites/apartments with ground floor reception, restaurant/bar and function space; sixth floor function space with roof terraces; and a gym (Use Class D2) at ground and first floor level, along with 3 floors of public car parking at basement level, accessed from Whitechapel.  (Alternative to scheme approved under planning permission (15F/0218).  **Revised plans and drawings and additional information received**.
site_address: Millennium House, 60 Victoria Street, Liverpool, L1 6JD
